name: Turkey Sandwich
recipe:
1. Toast the bread.
2. Add mayonnaise to one side of each slice.
3. Layer turkey, lettuce, and tomato on one slice of bread.
4. Place the other slice of bread on top and cut in half.

name: Varun the snacc
recipe:
1. Make sure Varun is well-groomed and freshly showered.
2. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
3. Enjoy your snack!

name: Hot Cheetos
recipe:
1. Open the bag of Hot Cheetos.
2. Eat the Hot Cheetos.

name: Fish
recipe:
1. Dredge fish fillet in flour.
2. Dip in beaten egg.
3. Coat with bread crumbs.
4. Heat oil in a frying pan over medium-high heat.
5. Fry fish until golden brown and cooked through.
6. Serve hot.

name: Knuckle Sandwich
recipe:
1. Toast the bread.
2. Place knuckles between slices of bread.
3. Serve with a side of pain.
